name: Bear
flavor_text: The last thing a poacher in the Krosan Forest hears is the brutal sound of claws tearing flesh.

name: Spirit
flavor_text: The joy of rebirth overshadows the sadness of death.

name: Wasteland
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice this land: Destroy target nonbasic land.
flavor_text:
"I will show you fear in a handful of dust."
—T. S. Eliot, "The Waste Land"

name: Bird
flavor_text: The landbound envy the birds' ultimate freedom in the sky.

name: Elephant
flavor_text: It's not slow. It's deciding whether to stomp you or gore you.

name: Saproling
flavor_text: The nauseating wriggling of a saproling is exceeded only by the nauseating wriggling of its prey.

name: Goblin Soldier
flavor_text: They rarely question their orders. Of course, they rarely understand them.

name: Beast
flavor_text: When the prey in Krosa no longer satisfied them, the beasts began to hunt their hunters.
